banner.presentation: Currently undergoing a internship as a developer analyst at ITS4U, I am passionate about programming. I enjoy exploring new technologies and adapting to their evolution to continuously enhance my skills. I develop my skills in software analysis and design as well as project management. I approach complex projects with rigor and motivation, which enables me to be effective and competent. I have a strong attachment to teamwork and I wish to continue to evolve in this direction. I am convinced that my skills and enthusiasm for computer science will allow me to make a significant contribution to innovative and exciting projects.
